author: ALAN SUDERMAN and CIARÁN FAHEY
title: Qatar deploys ex-spies to blunt German's World Cup criticism
description: DIEZ, Germany (AP) — As head of the German soccer federation, Theo Zwanziger was among his sport’s most prominent critics of the decision to award the 2022 World Cup to Qatar. He publicly attacked the energy-rich Gulf nation’s human rights record.
